name: The 1st eejits Creature Collection BOOK - Artist Edition
description:
Here it is, the first eejits book: a collection o' never-before-seen creatures, lovingly presented to you in a full colour art book.

Measures 7"x7" and contains 78 beautifully printed and exquisitely bound pages of full colour, never-before-seen creatures, pencil sketches and other eejity goodness. It needs to be held and caressed. Suitable for ages 7 and up.

The Artist Edition comes with an awesome &Â unique inked creature sketch on the first page and is signed by George Mackay.

name: eejits Activity Book
description:
Do you feel you're becoming an eejit? Brain in need o' a creative boost? Then you'll need this new eejits Activity Book! Designed to keep your wee (and not so wee) creatures entertained and delighted for hours!

Filled with 40 pages o' fun: colouring-in pages, soduko, wordsearches, mazes, puzzles and more. Suitable for ages 7 - 107.
